Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.redis.client

Interface MessageHandler

  • public interface MessageHandler
    Handler for Redis Pub/Sub messages.

    When a client subscribes to channels, it enters Pub/Sub mode and can only execute Pub/Sub commands. Messages arrive asynchronously through this handler.

    Usage Example

    
 session.subscribe("news", new MessageHandler() {
     public void handleMessage(String channel, byte[] message) {
         String text = new String(message, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
         System.out.println("Received on " + channel + ": " + text);
     }

     public void handlePatternMessage(String pattern, String channel, byte[] message) {
         // For psubscribe patterns
     }

     public void handleSubscribed(String channel, int subscriptionCount) {
         System.out.println("Subscribed to " + channel);
     }

     public void handleUnsubscribed(String channel, int subscriptionCount) {
         System.out.println("Unsubscribed from " + channel);
     }

     public void handleError(String error) {
         System.err.println("Pub/Sub error: " + error);
     }
 });
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessage

        void handleMessage​(java.lang.String channel,
                   byte[] message)
        Called when a message is received on a subscribed channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel the message was published to
        message - the message content

      • handlePatternMessage

        void handlePatternMessage​(java.lang.String pattern,
                          java.lang.String channel,
                          byte[] message)
        Called when a message matches a pattern subscription.

        This is called for channels matching patterns subscribed via PSUBSCRIBE.

        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern that matched
        channel - the actual channel the message was published to
        message - the message content

      • handleSubscribed

        void handleSubscribed​(java.lang.String channel,
                      int subscriptionCount)
        Called when a subscription is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel subscribed to
        subscriptionCount - the total number of subscriptions

      • handlePatternSubscribed

        void handlePatternSubscribed​(java.lang.String pattern,
                             int subscriptionCount)
        Called when a pattern subscription is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern subscribed to
        subscriptionCount - the total number of subscriptions

      • handleUnsubscribed

        void handleUnsubscribed​(java.lang.String channel,
                        int subscriptionCount)
        Called when an unsubscription is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel unsubscribed from
        subscriptionCount - the remaining subscription count

      • handlePatternUnsubscribed

        void handlePatternUnsubscribed​(java.lang.String pattern,
                               int subscriptionCount)
        Called when a pattern unsubscription is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern unsubscribed from
        subscriptionCount - the remaining subscription count

      • handleError

        void handleError​(java.lang.String error)
        Called when an error occurs in Pub/Sub mode.
        Parameters:
        error - the error message
